about_the_game:
The critically acclaimed update to the Space Invaders franchise is here to invade Steam with greatly improved graphics and audio!
Packed with pulsing, vibrant visuals enhanced further by interactive sound. The invaders have evolved, the question is: can you keep up?
This version includes 2 stages to play. Leaderboard functionality is not included.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2410M 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires an internet connection. Controller must be activated in Steam.
